commitMessage:
feat: implement project scaffold and layout shell

- Created top header with logo and export actions
- Implemented left sidebar with Tools and Filters tabs
- Implemented right sidebar with image adjustment sliders
- Created central main area for the image canvas
- Used Tailwind CSS flexbox for a responsive layout
prBody:
This PR implements the main application layout shell for PixelCraft Studio. It includes:
- A top header for branding and global actions (Undo, Redo, Export).
- A dual-tab left sidebar for editing tools and filter presets.
- A right sidebar for granular image adjustments (Brightness, Contrast, Saturation, etc.).
- A central workspace area prepared for the canvas component.
- Fully responsive layout using modern Tailwind CSS patterns.
notes: The layout is built using shadcn/ui components (Tabs, ScrollArea, Slider, Button, Separator) and Lucide icons. Type checking passed successfully.
